sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Textutils package contains the cat, cksum, comm, csplit, cut, expand, fmt, fold, head, join, md5sum, nl, od, paste, pr, ptx, sort, split, sum, tac, tail, tr, tsort, unexpand, uniq and wc programs.

sect3.title: cat
sect3.para: cat concatenates file(s) or standard input to standard output.

sect3.title: cksum
sect3.para: cksum prints CRC checksum and byte counts of each specified file.

sect3.title: comm
sect3.para: comm compares two sorted files line by line.

sect3.title: csplit
sect3.para: csplit outputs pieces of a file separated by (a) pattern(s) to files xx01, xx02, ..., and outputs byte counts of each piece to standard output.

sect3.title: cut
sect3.para: cut prints selected parts of lines from specified files to standard output.

sect3.title: expand
sect3.para: expand converts tabs in files to spaces, writing to standard output.

sect3.title: fmt
sect3.para: fmt reformats each paragraph in the specified file(s), writing to standard output.

sect3.title: fold
sect3.para: fold wraps input lines in each specified file (standard input by default), writing to standard output.

sect3.title: head
sect3.para: Print first xx (10 by default) lines of each specified file to standard output.

sect3.title: join
sect3.para: join joins lines of two files on a common field.

sect3.title: md5sum
sect3.para: md5sum prints or checks MD5 checksums.

sect3.title: nl
sect3.para: nl writes each specified file to standard output, with line numbers added.

sect3.title: od
sect3.para: od writes an unambiguous representation, octal bytes by default, of a specified file to standard output.

sect3.title: paste
sect3.para: paste writes lines consisting of the sequentially corresponding lines from each specified file, separated by TABs, to standard output.

sect3.title: pr
sect3.para: pr paginates or columnates files for printing.

sect3.title: ptx
sect3.para: ptx produces a permuted index of file contents.

sect3.title: sort
sect3.para: sort writes sorted concatenation of files to standard output.

sect3.title: split
sect3.para: split outputs fixed-size pieces of an input file to PREFIXaa, PREFIXab, ...

sect3.title: sum
sect3.para: sum prints checksum and block counts for each specified file.

sect3.title: tac
sect3.para: tac writes each specified file to standard output, last line first.

sect3.title: tail
sect3.para: tail print the last xx (10 by default) lines of each specified file to standard output.

sect3.title: tr
sect3.para: tr translates, squeezes, and/or deletes characters from standard input, writing to standard output.

sect3.title: tsort
sect3.para: tsort writes totally ordered lists consistent with the partial ordering in specified files.

sect3.title: unexpand
sect3.para: unexpand converts spaces in each file to tabs, writing to standard output.

sect3.title: uniq
sect3.para: Uniq removes duplicate lines from a sorted file.

sect3.title: wc
sect3.para: wc prints line, word, and byte counts for each specified file, and a total line if more than one file is specified.
